sentence.Network_en: A quasilinear equation is one in which the highest - order derivative appears linearly.
sentence.Network_cn: 最高阶导数线性地出现的那种方程是准线性方程.

sentence.Network_en: Linearly polarized light will in consequence become elliptically polarized on total reflection.
sentence.Network_cn: 因此,线偏振光径全反射后将变成椭圆偏振光.

sentence.Network_en: All forms of reciprocal theorems apply to structures which behave linearly.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有形式的互等定理都适用于线性受力状态的结构.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 在20Hz 至 3MHz的频率范围内，可任意以线性 (linearly) 或对数(logarithmically) 为座标来扫描及显示。 主要测试值或其第二测试值.
